name: 林水泉
objective: 先修課程：3002014或負責教授同意。燃料及燃燒、基本熱傳理論、蒸汽動力廠、壓縮機、燃氣輪機、內燃機、汽油引擎、柴油引擎、冷凍空調循環。
schedule:
1-2.GAS POWER CYCLE
3-4.VAPOR AND COMBINEDPOWER CYCLE
5-6.REFRIGERATION CYCLE
7-8.THERMODYNAMIC PROPERTY RELATIONS
9.期中考
10.GAS MIXTURES
11-12.GAS-VAPOR MIXTURES AND AIR CONDITIONING
13.CHEMICAL REACTION
14.CHEMICAL AND PHASE EQUILBRIUM
15-16.COMPRESSIBLE FLOW
17.EXERGY
18.期末考
scorePolicy:
平時:30%
期中考:30%
期未考:40%
